entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 05:09 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -17.5°C
Wind: NE 32 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
